entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
